participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and sociable, enjoys spending time with family and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: I've one brother. I like tacos. I've three sisters. I love dogs.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and introspective, enjoys outdoor activities and values a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I hate the color pink. I do not drink alcohol. I'm a huge coffee lover. My father was a construction worker. I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.
